lead_paragraph: New Orleans Saints defensive end Charles Grant has been indicted on a charge of involuntary manslaughter stemming from a February altercation at a Georgia nightclub. An Early County grand jury also charged six other people in the shooting death of Korynda Reed, 23. Grant was stabbed in the neck during the fracas. He was selected by the Saints in the first round of the 2002 draft. He had two and a half sacks in 2007 while starting 14 games for the Saints.
